title: The Beast In Me
description: Meg vanished from Jay's life. Not even Peter knows what has happened to her, what White has done to her or - even worse - is currently doing to her. Without having Meghan to keep him sane, Jay struggles to keep control over his body, and to face not only his new everyday life, but also the scattered memories of his encounters with the woman who brought his humanity back to the surface. Eventually, he knows that he has to face the Beast within, because this time it's his turn to save her.
author: D.S. Wrights
